job.title: Data Specialist
job.description:
Manages the organizational client tracking database. Ensures timely data input and quality. Prioritizes inbound technical assistance, training, configuration, and reporting work requests. Works with program staff and leadership to consult, advise, and perform various ad-hoc and project-based content development/build data analysis and reports. This includes both routine data review and reporting and customized, ad-hoc, and business intelligence-oriented work. Must maintain an updated understanding of required software.

A non-profit organization with daily interaction with client customers, including individuals who have barriers to employment. Must work with diverse populations and be able to give high-quality customer service.

Required
  • Knowledge of SharePoint tools like ULS Logs, workflows to automate business processes, and SharePoint forms for tasks and document storage.
  • Advanced Excel.
  • Database structure knowledge, especially Caseworthy
  • Some SQL preferred
